net.sourceforge.taglets.impl.loader
Class JARClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      net.sourceforge.taglets.impl.loader.MemoryClassLoader
          net.sourceforge.taglets.impl.loader.JARClassLoader

public class JARClassLoader
extends MemoryClassLoader

Class loader that loads serves entries from a JAR file.

The class loader loads the whole JAR file, expands it to memory and serves classes and resources from the data loaded in memory.

Warning:

Use this class loader to load JAR files on the classpath, since the standard URLClassLoader cannot handle nested JARs.

Version:
1.9 (2008/03/30 12:43:18)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.4.1

Constructor Detail

JARClassLoader

public JARClassLoader(URL url,
                      ClassLoader parent)
               throws IOException
Creates a new JAR class loader that loads the JAR file from the specified URL and caches all entries in memory.

Parameters:
url - the URL of the JAR file to load.
parent - the parent class loader to use for class resolving.
Throws:
IOException - if there is an error while loading the JAR file.
Since:
1.4.1

                    throws IOException
Reads the whole contents of the specified JAR entry.

Parameters:
is - the input stream to read from.
entry - the entry to read.
Returns:
the entry data.
Throws:
IOException - exceptions are passed on.
Since:
1.4.1

load

protected void load(URL url)
             throws IOException
Loads the JAR file at the specified URL and initializes the underlying MemoryClassLoader with its entries.

Parameters:
url - the URL pointing to the JAR file to read.
Throws:
IOException - exceptions are passed on.
